text: Utkarsh Ambudkar ( ; born December 8, 1983), also known by his stage name UTK the INC, is an American actor, rapper, and singer. He played Skatch, a con artist, in a deleted scene of the 2020 Disney live-action remake of Mulan. That same year he appeared in Disney's Godmothered, and then in the 2021 action comedy Free Guy.PRODUCTION HAS BEGUN ON NEW DISNEY+ MOVIE "GODMOTHERED" Ambudkar will play King Bumi in the Netflix live-action series Avatar: The Last Airbender. And he also voices Master Control from the DreamWorks TV show Trolls: The Beat Goes On!. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Baltimore Category:Rappers from Maryland Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Baltimore Category:Marathi people
title: Utkarsh Ambudkar
